issue_kinds.default_short_message: Type does not have the required member.
issue_kinds.default_detailed_message: The type used in a template instantiation does not provide the required member function or field.

issue_kinds.default_short_message: No matching function for template call.
issue_kinds.default_detailed_message: The template call cannot be resolved to any viable overload with the given arguments.
The deduced template parameter type does not match the required constraints or expected type.
